com.droid.gamedev

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.droid.gamedev.Game
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameEngine

    public abstract class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of a single screen game
    Author:
    Steph
